name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Mark Ray GEDDES and Charles H. Knisely, Appellants

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.

casebody.head_matter:
391 A.2d 1014
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Mark Ray GEDDES and Charles H. Knisely, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 14, 1977.
Decided Oct. 5, 1978.
Thomas M. Torquato, Reedsville, Stephen W. Beik, Miller, Kistler, Campbell, Mittinger & Beik, State College, for appellants.
Francis A. Searer, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
